summary:
[color=red]What does this mod do?[/color]

Replaces the original sounds of shouts from dragons, to dubstep!

[color=blue]What makes this mod good?[/color]

It can defeat the normal sounds of dragon shouting with...dubstep.

Thanks for the views and downloads!

descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/07SO7fx.jpg[/img]

[color=red]What does this mod do?[/color]
Replaces the original sounds of shouts from dragons, to dubstep!
[color=blue]What makes this mod good?[/color]
It can make combat more intense and exciting!

[size=32]Beta 1.2[/size]

This mod is still in beta, and will be updated soon,


yes the video doesn't show much because I am still editing this mod and making the music dubstep (Combat) and the shouts, what I am doing at the moment is editing all the sounds to make them dubstep (This process takes a while as I have to convert it and change the sounds itself) I am also making more mods (E.g homes) That are finished right away to get more endorsements to be encouraged about bigger projects, so...

[b][u][i][color=blue][size=4][font=courier]
ENDORSE
[/font][/size][/color][/i][/u][/b]
